doc:
Ken Jones (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ken_Jones_(actor) 0 Ken Jones (20 February 1930 – 13 February 2014) was an English actor. Jones was born in Liverpool. After working as a signwriter and performing as an amateur, he trained at RADA. Known for his roles as 'Horrible' Ives in Porridge and as Rex in The Squirrels. He also appeared in The Liver Birds as Uncle Dermot, in Goodnight Sweetheart as Owen Jones, and in Seconds Out as Dave Locket. Ken_Jones ( 20_February_1930 – 13_February_2014 ) was an_English_actor . Jones was_born in Liverpool . After working as a_signwriter and performing as an_amateur , he trained at RADA . Known for his_roles as '_Horrible_'_Ives in Porridge and as Rex in The_Squirrels . He also appeared in The_Liver Birds as Uncle_Dermot , in Goodnight_Sweetheart as Owen_Jones , and in Seconds Out as Dave_Locket .
